## How to test?
- [ ] API: `cd apps/api && pytest`
- [ ] FE: `cd apps/frontend && npm test` (if available)

## Checklist
- [ ] CI is green
- [ ] Did not change contract tests (unless agreed)
- [ ] Added/updated tests for new behavior
- [ ] No secrets committed (.env, DATABASE_URL, keys)
